description: OSDF nodes must adhere to this structure.

read.description: List of groups that can read the node.

write.description: List of groups that can write/modify/delete the node.

id.description: The node ID. Omitted when a node is first inserted, so technically optional.

linkage.description: The nodes that the node links to.

meta.description: The node data. The specific structure of this is controlled by the node type's schema.

node_type.description: What kind of node this is.

ns.description: What namespace that the node belongs to.

ver.description: The node's version. Omitted when a node is first inserted, so technically optional.
